dc_title_s: Geological map of a portion of the Southern Interior of British Columbia by George Dawson D.S., A.R.S.M., F.G.S.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. "The Burland Lithographic Co. Montreal." 1 map: col.; 53 x 51 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Dawson, George Mercer, 1849-1901.,Geological Survey of Canada.
